paper_abstract: A new ensemble of support vector machines (SVM) based on random subspace (RS) and feature selection is developed and applied to the problem of differential diagnosis of crythemato-squanious diseases. Each classifier has a "favourite" class. To find the feature subset for the classifier D-i with "favourite" class w(i), we calculate the best features to discriminate this class (wi) from all the other classes. Our results improved the average predictive accuracy obtained by a "stand-alone" SVM or by a RS ensemble of SVM. (c) 2005 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An ensemble of classifiers for the diagnosis of erythemato-squamous diseases
